{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=Velop |revision=(WHW0301) |asin=B01N2NLRSD |newegg=N82E16833124640 |price=230 |series=AC2200 |fcc_date=11/21/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, mesh node |fcc_id=Q87-WHW03 |ic_id=3839A-WHW03 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019 |cpu1_cspeed=716 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM4G1FEPD |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, SON, Bluetooth 4.0 LE, ZigBee |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=VelopSetupXXX }}
:• 2x '''867''' Mbps max PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• 1x '''400''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Tri-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi Mesh Node}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-WHW0301/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WHW0301|pid=01t340000042iGXAAY}} Setup URL: http://LinksysSmartWiFi.com * Linksys Velop WHW03'''01''': 1-pack starter / Add-on unit * Linksys Velop WHW03'''02''': 2-pack * Linksys Velop WHW03'''03''': 3-pack 2x WAN/LAN auto-sensing Gigabit Ethernet ports. ===News=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/10954/linksys-enters-mesh-wifi-market-with-velop-whole-home-wifi-expands-maxstream-lineup ''Linksys Enters Mesh Wi-Fi Market with Velop Whole Home Wi-Fi,
Expands MAX-STREAM Lineup'' on '''AnandTech'''] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33073-linksys-velop-whole-home-mesh-wi-fi-reviewed '' Linksys Velop Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :'''CPU:''' [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Quad-core Wave2 2T2R abgn/ac WiSoC) :'''Flash:''' [[Samsung]] KLM4G1FEPD (4GB eMMC), RAM: 512MB (DDR3) :'''2.4GHz Radio:''' [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 + 2x MSC5533621E (2.4GHz PA) :'''5GHz Radio #1:''' [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 + 2x [[Skyworks]] SKY85408-11 (PA) :'''5GHz Radio #2:''' [[QCA]] QCA9886 (2T2R) + 2x [[Skyworks]] SKY85408-11 (PA) :'''ZigBee:''' ''[[Silicon Labs]]'' EM3581 (SoC) + ''SiGe'' SE2432L (2.4GHz FEM) :'''Bluetooth:''' [[CSR]] (CSR1021/CSR8510 ?) Bluetooth 4.0 LE SoC :'''Switch:''' [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8072 GbE (1x LAN/1x WAN) *[https://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/8090/linksys-velop-mesh-whole-home-wireless-system-review/index.html '' Linksys Velop Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi Reviewed'' on '''TweakTown'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/linksys-velop-review '' Linksys Velop WHW03 Reviewed'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] ===See also=== * [[List of Wireless Systems]] __NOTOC__
